name: NonPestisYersiniosisInfectionTestsYersiniaNonPestisSpeciesByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Non pestis Yersiniosis Infection (Tests Yersinia non pestis species by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of non-pestis yersinia species in a culture.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: yersiniosis|Yersinia enterocolitica|Yersinia pseudotuberculosis|Yersinia),(Exclusion Criteria: pestis)
